game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must explore the forgotten ruins in search of a legendary artifact. Be prepared for challenges and hidden dangers.
game.reward: 100 experience points and a magical amulet

task.description: Find the entrance to the ancient ruins and brave the dangers within.
Dispel the magic animating a guardian statue blocking your path to the artifact.
Locate and safely retrieve the artifact from its pedestal without triggering any traps.
